data.eml:eml: The genus Acantholyda (Hymenoptera, Pamphiliidae) of Japan: A revised key and a description of the previously unknown female of Acantholyda flaviventris

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shinohara, Akihiko, Kato, Yu (2017): The genus Acantholyda (Hymenoptera, Pamphiliidae) of Japan: A revised key and a description of the previously unknown female of Acantholyda flaviventris. Zootaxa 4221 (2): 215-219, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.248652
